vee CTE MAC, NO-7137 OF 2014
Dated this the 5‚Äù day of January, 2015
ORDER
Admitted. Heard.

2. The request is for an expeditious disposal of

C.C.1000/2010 by the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate's
Court, Ernakulam. Perused the report filed by the learned
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate's Court, Ernakulam.
The learned Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate, Ernakulam
is directed to dispose of the matter, as expeditiously as
possible, at any rate, within a period of three months from
today.

This Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above.

Sd/-
(B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE)
